00061

00063   namespace index {

00065       File* _file;
00066       DocListDiskBlockReader _reader;
00067       ReadBuffer _readBuffer;
00068       DocListInfo _info;

00073       
00074       bool _skipToNextBlock();
00075       void _fetchDocument();
00076

00078       DocListFileIterator( File* file, int segment, size_t bufferSize, File::offset_type fileOffset = 0 );
00079

00086

00088       int termID() const;

00090       void remove();
00091     };
00092   }
